title: ‘Parade’ Review: The Trial and Tragedy of Leo Frank
description: City Center’s gala production delves further into America’s history of violence and delivers the best-sung musical in many a New York season.
dc:creator: Juan A. Ramírez
media:description: Ben Platt, left, as Leo Frank and Micaela Diamond as Lucille Frank in a revival of the 1998 musical “Parade” at New York City Center.
